actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Presidential Primary Matching Payment Account Act to provide that contributions received by any individual after such individual ceases to be a candidate for nomination for election to the office of President shall not be eligible for matching payments.

summary.text: Amends the Presidential Primary Matching Payment Account Act to require any person who ceases to be a candidate for nomination for election to be President of the United States to notify the Federal Election Commission. Provides that any contribution received by an individual after a withdrawal from the primary shall be disregarded in determining any entitlement to matching payments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Presidential Primary Matching Payment Account Act to provide that contributions received by any individual after such individual ceases to be a candidate for nomination for election to the office of President shall not be eligible for matching payments.
